result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.

result.eng: Where did the wrinkles in his forehead come from?

result.eng: They have been living in America for years.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na blianta
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na blianta
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na bliantaThey have been living in America for years.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i Meiriceá leis na bliantaThey have been living in America for years.

result.eng: They only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ga: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.orig: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimse
result.html: Níl siad ina gcónaí ach cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.
result.ponchtml: Níl siad ina gcónaí aċ cúpla míle uaimseThey only live a couple of miles away from me.

result.eng: They live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ga: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.orig: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm Sobotka
result.html: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ina gcónaí i mbaile darb ainm SobotkaThey live in a town called Sobotka.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.html: D'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí beirt iníonaċa óga ina diaiḋ nuair a ṫáinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: Ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa GhearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.

result.eng: The whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ga: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: D'fhan an tír go léir faoi dhianslándáil ar feadh tamaill fhada ina dhiaidh sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan an tír go léir faoi ḋianslándáil ar feaḋ tamaill ḟada ina ḋiaiḋ sinThe whole country remained under intensive security for a long while after that.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.html: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an Iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ga: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.orig: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.html: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ponchtml: Éilíonn gontaċt na formáide 140 caraċtar naċ dtéann an scríḃneoir ċun fadála ina ċuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: Many ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ga: Is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbh
result.orig: Is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbh
result.html: Is iomaí gnáthdhuine a bhfuil gunna ina sheilbhMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí gnáṫḋuine a ḃfuil gunna ina ẛeilḃMany ordinary people have a gun in their possession.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: He was arrested with a gun in his possession.
result.ga: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aige
result.orig: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aige
result.html: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaḋ é agus gunna ina ẛeilḃ aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ga: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.orig: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.html: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Éireannaċ ab ea é a ḃí ina ċónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.

result.eng: It was said that he was well-off.
result.ga: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.html: Bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí iomrá go raiḃ sé ina ẛáiṫ den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.

result.eng: He looked around with scare and panic.
result.ga: D'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.orig: D'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.html: D'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar scáfar ina ṫimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.html: Sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.

result.eng: She was growing up to be a girl.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.orig: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailín
result.html: Bhí sí ag teannadh aníos ar a bheith ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag teannaḋ aníos ar a ḃeiṫ ina cailínShe was growing up to be a girl.

result.eng: There is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ga: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.orig: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinín
result.html: Níl dada le gnóthú ar a bheith easumhal don té a bhfuil tú ina mhuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.
result.ponchtml: Níl dada le gnóṫú ar a ḃeiṫ easuṁal don té a ḃfuil tú ina ṁuinínThere is nothing to be gained from being rebellious to people you depend on.

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ina ṁuinín fá ċoinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: There was no point in him opposing them.
result.ga: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.orig: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadan
result.html: Ní raibh gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ gar leis cur ina n-éadanThere was no point in him opposing them.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ga: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.orig: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.html: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ponchtml: Lá arna ṁáraċ ḃí Séimí arís ina ċruṫ féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
